post.title: Wtf china
post.body: Look at the current state of china, Essential stealing forcing users to give up their privacy, absolutely atrocious. A post going in to deatail can be found here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:2_15Q5U52Aqgjb66GkzhkGKDYgWsqR8TEkJG/The+LAST+chance+of+seeing+Chinese+on+free+Internet
